page.title: 12Trade & Services - Southwick
page.content: Southwick has 5 shops: a ladies hairdresser, a shop selling hardware and DIY materials, a butcher, a sub- post office selling food and including an off-licence, and a supermarket with off-licence and newsagency which also sells home brewing and winemaking materials. There are 3 mobile shops: a bank, a fish and chip van, both visiting weekly, and a baker providing home delivery service. 2 dairies provide doorstep milk deliveries every day except Sunday. There is a car breaker's yard, a garage, a civil engineering contractor's depot and a window cleaning service. Three residents offer bed and breakfast accomodation and there are 2 public house/restaurants.
